titles: Die Sabbathi, 27. May, 1643. The Commons being informed that many souldiers listed, and in pay under the command of the Lord Generall, the Earl of Essex, do daily withdraw themselves to the great prejudice of the present service ...
author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
notes: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
keywords: Absence without leave --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
